62.comment: A morph that renders arbitrary HTML. Makes integrations of non-morphic content straightforward. Look inside the menu to open an HTML editor or export the content as an HTML document.

63.author: robertkrahn
63.message: Fixed reset as suggested by Rick. Thanks Rick!
